code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import PlaylistShow from"./playlist_show";import{withRouter}from"react-router-dom";import{fetchPlaylist as _fetchPlaylist}from'../../actions/playlist_actions';import{playAllTracks as _playAllTracks,playTrack as _playTrack}from'../../actions/player_queue_actions';var mapStateToProp=function mapStateToProp(state,ownProps){return{currentUserId:state.session.user.id,playlist:state.entities.playlist.current,username:state.session.user.username};};var mapDispatchToProp=function mapDispatchToProp(dispatch){return{fetchPlaylist:function fetchPlaylist(playlistId){return dispatch(_fetchPlaylist(playlistId));},playAllTracks:function playAllTracks(tracks){return dispatch(_playAllTracks(tracks));},playTrack:function playTrack(track){return dispatch(_playTrack(track));}};};export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProp,mapDispatchToProp)(PlaylistShow));
